title: Law of demand, price down Qd up

content.question: Which of the following best describes the law of demand?

choices.label: The price of a good increases when the demand for the good increases.
The price of a good decreases when the supply of the good decreases.
When the price of a good increases, its demand decreases.
When the price of a good decreases, its quantity demanded increases.

content.answer: When the price of a good decreases, its quantity demanded increases.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
